name: quaRUNtine (YuHuuGames)
description:
Halo good people! YUHUU Games Development are happy for releasing our work-in treadmill game called quaRUNtine for your #stayhome time. Keep healthy with quaRUNtine and scan or tap the QR code/URL link for donation, for medical staff, doctor, government and global citizen.

For ANDROID USER you all can download by scan or tap the QR code/URL link of quaRUNtine, enjoy work-in treadmill game experience and let your homies play too.

For IPHONE USER, due the documents issue, you all still can sharing the experience with your ANDROID’S HOMIES.

Sharing is caring isn’t it? Do not forget to scan or tap QR code/URL link for donation please. It means a lot. Thanks good people. Love, YUHUU Game Development.
